Text:
Tried to unzip with several Unzipp-Applications. No chance. Why the fuck do you seed a Mac-game compressed in a windows-only-format!? 
maybe you can reupload in a file-format that is more common with the mac!? Would be nice. 

Thanks anyway for the upload.

Thx for you comment dud!
So,i made my first torrent 2 days ago, i have never done one before :S
I have any experience.

Okay,a win only format is a problem,didnt knew it was win only :S
I will look now
Here we go,i will upload a programm (in zip format) that can extract rar files. i will reupload all mac files in rar :)

Use 'The Unarchiver' - Its possible with that to unrar/unzip most files. The Unarchiver can handle rar, zip and other formats. It also work with Win and/or Mac files.
No problems since years.
